title: LBoL Logs - Run History Sharing
underConstruction:
This site is under construction.
It is opened for demo purpose.
about:
LBoL Logs is run history sharing service of Touhou: Lost Branch of Legend (LBoL).
The orginal run data of the game has limited information and only 50 records are held, so data generated by custom Mod LBoL Run Logger (WIP) is used instead.
Feedback are welcome here.

value: Language switch (sorry for my poor English)

next: Stations other than battle (events, shop, etc.)
